LanguageData.CommandForbiddenDesc: Forbidden - colonists will not interact with this.
LanguageData.CommandNotForbiddenDesc: Not forbidden - colonists may interact with this.
LanguageData.CommandDesignateTogglePowerDesc: Designate this thing to have power toggled. A colonist will come soon to flick the switch.
LanguageData.CommandTryReconnectDesc: Try to connect to a different power net within my connection radius. This is useful if I'm connected to an unpowered net but there is a powered net nearby.
LanguageData.CommandGatherSpotToggleDescActive: Active - colonists will gather around this object.
LanguageData.CommandGatherSpotToggleDescInactive: Inactive - colonists will not gather around this object.
LanguageData.CommandToggleDraftDesc: Toggle military draft.\n\nDrafted people take orders and fight. They will not work, eat, or rest.
LanguageData.CommandBedSetOwnerDesc: Assign this bed to be owned by a specific colonist.
LanguageData.CommandBedSetForPrisonersDesc: Assign beds in this room for use by prisoners.
LanguageData.CommandBedSetForPrisonersFailOutdoors: Cannot set outdoor beds to be for prisoners.
LanguageData.CommandBedSetForColonistsDesc: Assign beds in this room for use by colonists.
LanguageData.CommandBedSetAsMedicalDesc: Assign this bed for medical use.
LanguageData.CommandBedSetAsNonMedicalDesc: Assign this bed for non medical use.
LanguageData.TurningOnPrisonerBedWarning: Turning on prisoner mode affects the whole room (since prisoners and colonists cannot sleep in the same room).\n\nThese people will lose ownership of their beds:
LanguageData.TurningOffPrisonerBedWarning: Turning off prisoner mode affects the whole room (since prisoners and colonists cannot sleep in the same room).\n\nThese people will lose ownership of their beds:
LanguageData.AreYouSure: Are you sure you want to do this?
LanguageData.CommandSetForceAttackTargetDesc: Sets a target that this turret must attack continuously as long as it can.
LanguageData.CommandStopForceAttackDesc: Stops force-attacking and allows the turret to fire as it wishes.
LanguageData.CommandShipLaunchDesc: Start the ship launch sequence with the current configuration.
LanguageData.CommandShipLaunchReportDesc: Show a readiness report about the ship's launch capability.
LanguageData.CommandPodEjectDesc: Wake up the cryptosleeper and eject them.
LanguageData.CommandToggleDoorLockDesc: Lock or unlock a door. Locked doors will not open for anyone.
LanguageData.CommandResetTempDesc: Reset the target temperature to room temperature.
LanguageData.CommandInstallDesc: This item is currently packaged up for storage and transport. Use this command to install this item in a final location so it can be viewed or used.
LanguageData.CommandMakeBeaconStockpileDesc: Create a stockpile around this building exactly matching the shape of the beacon's launch radius.

CommandLaunchGroupFailNotConnectedToFuel: Some transport pods in this loading group are not connected to a fueling port.
CommandFireAtWillDesc: Toggle fire at will.\n\nWhen disabled, this character will not automatically shoot at ranged targets. Does not affect melee combat.
CommandFulfillTradeOfferDesc: Fulfill the settlement's request for goods and claim your reward.
CommandSplitCaravanDesc: Split this caravan into two. The caravans can be later merged back into one as long as they are close to each other.
CommandAutoRearmDesc: If this is on, this trap will automatically be designated for rearming when it springs.
CommandAllowSowDesc: When disabled, colonists will never sow plants in this zone. They will still harvest.
CommandLaunchGroupDesc: Initiates the targeting process for launching a group of transport pods. The next step is choosing a target. The pods will fly and land together.
CommandFulfillTradeOfferFailInsufficient: Your caravan must have {0} to fulfill this trade offer.
CommandLaunchGroupFailNoFuel: Some pod launchers in this group have no fuel.
CommandSettleFailEnemies: There are enemies in this area.
CommandTradeFailNoNegotiator: There isn't any conscious, not broken negotiator.
CommandSetTargetFuelLevelDesc: Set the target fuel level. Colonists will attempt to fill this up to the target fuel level.
CommandSelectNextTransporterDesc: Select next transport pod in this launch group.
CommandGraveAssignColonistDesc: Assign this grave to be owned by a specific colonist.
CommandReinstallDesc: Designate this item to be uninstalled and reinstalled somewhere else.
CommandSunLampMakeGrowingZoneDesc: Create a growing zone around this building exactly matching the shape of the lamp's light radius.
CommandClearPrioritizedWorkDesc: Clear any prioritized work you assigned. The character will go back to their usual self-directed activities.
CommandLoadTransporterFailNoFuel: The pod launcher has no fuel.
CommandToggleDoorForbidDesc: When a door is forbidden, colonists and allies will not go through it. This doesn't affect how enemies or animals interact with the door.
CommandSettleDesc: Settle in this area. Your colonists will enter this area and you will be able to start building a new home.
CommandPasteZoneSettingsDesc: Overwrite this zone's settings with those previously copied to the clipboard.
CommandTakeOffConfirmation: Are you sure you want to launch the ship?\n\nEveryone in this area will escape the planet. Everyone else will be left behind.
CommandSettleFailNoColonists: There isn't anybody there to claim the area.
CommandSelectAllTransportersDesc: Select all transport pods in this launch group.
CommandAbandonHomeFailAllColonistsThere: All of your colonists are there.
CommandLoadTransporterFailNotConnectedTo: The transport pod is not connected to a fueling port.
CommandSelectPreviousTransporterDesc: Select previous transport pod in this launch group.
CommandBuildCopyDesc: Build a copy of this building.
CommandSelectPlantToGrowDesc: Determine which plant should be sown here.
CommandLaunchGroupFailUnderRoof: Some pod launchers are under a roof.
CommandSettleFailAlreadyHaveBase: Your faction can only have one base.
CommandReleaseAnimalsDesc: While this is on, mastered animals are sent forth to attack distant targets. While it is off, they remain near and guard the master.
CommandTakeOffDesc: Get on board the ship and escape the planet.
CommandFormCaravanDesc: Form a group of colonists able to travel to new areas. The colonists will gather all the assigned supplies and accompanying animals, leave their current area, and await further orders.
CommandDesignateOpenCloseVentDesc: Designate this vent to be opened or closed. A colonist will come soon to perform the task.
CommandCancelLoadDesc: Cancel loading this with people or items and eject everything already loaded.
CommandSquadAttackDesc: Order selected colonists to attack designated target.
CommandAbandonHomeDesc: Abandon this area. The area will become inaccessible and you will not be able to return here ever again. After abandoning your home, you will be able to order one of your caravans to settle in a new area.
CommandLoadTransporterDesc: Defines the selected transporter(s) as a launch group. Opens the loading dialog so you can decide who and what should be loaded inside.
CommandReformCaravanFailHostilePawns: There are still some enemies in this area.
CommandCopyZoneSettingsDesc: Copy this zone's settings to the clipboard so you can paste them onto another zone.
CommandReformCaravanDesc: Reform a group of colonists. The colonists will leave their current area and await further orders.
CommandToggleDoorHoldOpenDesc: When active, your colonists will not close the door after passing through.
